The advisory tweets now excerpts from the speech of President Dilma during the inauguration of the tunnel # Rio450.
RT @blogplanalto: #AoVivo President @dilmabr speaks at the inauguration of the tunnel # Rio450 http://t.co/bo7ygIovmY
Today, Rio celebrates its 450th anniversary and we have to celebrate and have to bring a gift - here is a part of my gift, the Rio450 tunnel.
In Rio we have the combination of sea / beach and mountains / green. We are recovering the historical edge for the population and the city. # Rio450
In doing so, the City of Rio de Janeiro places itself at the international vanguard of urban transformation. # Rio450
Although several cities have regained their port areas, none of them have recovered the historic center of a country at the same time.
I made the crossing of the tunnel, which preserves all the historic buildings on the surface and shows real care with that. # Rio450
I was very happy when I inaugurated Transcarioca, which cuts the city and allows 400 thousand people to have quality transportation. # Rio450
I have ctz of q this celebration paves the way to celebrate the next 450 ensuring that this is one of the most beautiful cities in the world # Rio450
President Dilma, governor @LFPezao and mayor @eduardopaes_ during the inaugural course of the tunnel # Rio450 http://t.co/3VeAsLguUN
The advisory tweets now excerpts from the speech of President Dilma in the celebrations of # Rio450.
RT @blogplanalto: #AoVivo President @dilmabr speaks at the anniversary ceremony of # Rio450. Follow: http://t.co/bo7ygIovmY
Rio de Janeiro is a differentiated city, which has reflected in it the history of this country. # Rio450
The Quay of Valongo reminds us of the bondage from which we have been freed, but we must continue to fight against discrimination. # Rio450
The #Porto Maravilha integrates the city back to its historical center and its natural beauties. # Rio450
We are here building conditions so that Rio de Janeiro is this fantastic city to live, because it has a contagious joy. # Rio450
We will be present to guarantee the works, but mainly the projects of cultural, social and historical rescue of that city. # Rio450
Rio de Janeiro, count on us! Happy Birthday! # Rio450

Nafarijika na ushiriki mzuri wa wananchi katika zoezi la uandikishaji wa wapiga kura toka lilipoanza mwezi Februari huko Makambako.
Tujitokeze kwenda kujiandikisha katika maeneo yetu kama itakavyotolewa na Tume ya Taifa ya Uchaguzi. Tuitumie fursa hii wakati huu muafaka.
Watakaojiandikisha wakati huu ndio watakaopiga kura ya maoni kuhusu Katiba Inayopendekezwa na Uchaguzi Mkuu wa Oktoba mwaka huu. (1)
Vitambulisho vya zamani vya mpiga kura havitatumika. Wote ambao ni Watanzania & wana umri wa miaka 18 au zaidi lazima kuandikishwa upya. (2)
Wanasiasa, dini na asasi za kiraia tuungane na Serikali na Tume ya Uchaguzi katika kuwakumbusha na kuwahamasisha wananchi wakajiandikishe.
Kupiga kura kuamua kuhusu Katiba Inayopendekezwa au kuchagua Rais, Wabunge na Madiwani ni haki na wajibu wa kila raia. (1)
Lakini, kuipata haki hiyo na kuweza kutimiza wajibu huo kunategemea kuwa na kitambulisho cha mpiga kura.  Bila ya hivyo haiwezekani.  (2)
Kabla ya kura ya maoni juu ya Katiba Inayopendekezwa tumesisitiza wananchi kuisoma na kuielewa. Vitabu 1,558,805 tayari vimechapishwa. (1)
Nakala 1,341,300 zimesambazwa.  Nakala 1,141,300 zimesambazwa kwenye mikoa 25 Tanzania Bara na nakala 200,000 zimegawiwa kwa Zanzibar. (2)
Kwa upande wa Tanzania Bara kila Kata imepewa vitabu 300, ikiwa na maana ya vitabu 60 kwa kila kijiji. (3)
Tume ya Uchaguzi itatoa maelekezo ya elimu kwa umma. Asasi za kiraia 420 (Bara) & 75 (Zanzibar) zimejiandikisha kwa ajili ya zoezi hilo. (4)
Tume ya Uchaguzi pia itatoa maelekezo husika kuhusu kampeni ya Kura ya Maoni ya Katiba Inayopendekwa wakati ukiwadia. (5)
Yesterday I welcomed president Alpha Condé of #Guinea to the Council. http://t.co/R93M15Pbcn
Mauaji ya albino ni jambo linalofedhehesha na kulidhalilisha taifa letu. Wakati wote Serikali imelipa uzito mkubwa suala hili. (1)
Naungana na Chama cha Albino Tanzania kulaani ukatili huu na kutaka hatua madhubuti zichukuliwe dhidi ya wahusika. (2)
Tumeshughulikia wahalifu hawa na tumefanya hivyo bila ya kuchoka tangu tukio la kwanza baada ya mimi kuingia madarakani Aprili 17, 2006. (3)
Mwaka 2006 mpaka 2015, watuhumiwa 139 wametiwa nguvuni, miongoni mwao wako watuhumiwa 16 wa matukio ya Desemba na Januari mwaka huu. (4)

Mashauri 35 yamefunguliwa mahakamani na kati ya hayo 10 bado yanaendelea na yapo katika hatua mbalimbali.  (5)
Watuhumiwa wamepatikana na hatia. Kati ya hao waliopatikana na hatia 13 wamehukumiwa kifo na wawili wamepata kifungo cha miezi 6. (6)
Hatuwezi kushinda uhalifu bila ushirikiano baina ya wananchi na vyombo vya ulinzi na usalama. Tuendelee kuwafichua wahusika. (7)
Februari 28, 2015 tulipata habari ya majonzi makubwa ya kifo cha Mbunge wa Mbinga Magharibi, Mheshimiwa Capt. John Damian Komba. (1)
Kifo chake kimeliondolea taifa letu mmoja wa viongozi wazuri, msanii mahiri, raia mwema na mzalendo wa kweli. (2)
Alitumia muda mwingi na vipaji vyake kuitumikia nchi yetu katika mambo mbalimbali. Tuungane na familia yake kumwombea mapumziko mema. (3)

"I want to thank you, Democrats and Republicans, for your common support of Israel. Year after year, decade after decade." #NetanyahuSpeech

"I know that Israel does not stand alone. I know that America stands with Israel. I know that you stand with Israel." #NetanyahuSpeech
